import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { request } from "../../api/api"; export default function Index() { const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); // const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); const { gender, setGender } = useState(null); let [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ "Studentno": "", "Firstname": "", "Middlename": "", "Lastname": "", "Emailaddress": "", "Age": 0, "Address": "", "Gender": "", "Country": "", "Contactno": "", "Civilstatus": "", "Schoolcampus": "", "Degree": "", "Course": "", "Pictureblob": "", "ApprovedBy": "", "Servicecategorypriority": "", "RoleId": "", "Username": "", "Password": "", "Accountno": "", "Accountname": "", "Bankname": "", "Location": "" }); useEffect(() => { }, []); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } setValidated(true); }; const handleChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); userDetails[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setUserDetails(userDetails); console.log(JSON.stringify(userDetails)); } async function doLogin() { const payload = userDetails; payload["Gender"] = gender ? "Male" : "Female"; const result = await request('register', payload); alert(JSON.stringify(result)); } // const onSubmit = (data) => { // alert(JSON.stringify(data)); // }; return (

Registration

setGender(!gender)} value={gender} type="radio" name="gender" id="male">
setGender(!gender)} value={!gender} type="radio" name="gender" id="female">

); }
